B.Sc.CSIT Course has a huge weight in computer relevant subjects, which builds a good portfolio and helps you to reach the pinnacle of your career in this ever-growing competitive market. BSc.CSIT has a total of 8 semesters where each semester is of 6 months, the final semester is combined with an internship.

patterns: I would like to know about bca
responses: BCA is a relatively new course whose objective is to produce high quality computer application developers
It is an undergraduate course in the domain of computer applications, which is of duration three years. This course consist of eight semesters of six months each.

patterns: which is better bsccsit or bca?
responses: Well it depends!!! BCA is mainly for commerce background students who want to pursue a course in IT field and BSCIT is for students from science background and more in-depth course.

Both of these courses have their own advantages. While students who are interested in the field of internet or database operations can opt for BscCSIT, those who want to pursue a career in computer applications, programming and software should go for a BCA.

patterns: How should I contact the college?
responses: For extensive information you can reach us at: 01-4620522 / 01-4620523 / 014620524 or you can email your query at: info@newsummit.edu.np

patterns: What facilities do i get here?
What are the benifits of being a student here?
responses: Well there a lot of good things about this college you will benifit from, the most important one being that you can explore and reach beyond your potential with all the help teachers and the college provide you with.

The NewSummit college has state-of-the-art physical facilities for quality education. All the classrooms are supported by multimedia projectors with comfortable furniture. Our Library, Computer and Science Labs are excellent.

patterns: I want to know about the faculty members
responses: Well our BscCSIT and BCA faculty members include Mr.ChokRaj Dawadi as HOD and other professors and assistant professors include Mr.XYZ, Mrs.XYZ, Mr.AAA, Mr.BBB, Mrs.ABC

Admission to the BSc.CSIT and BCA program is based on the written entrance test. The examination format is similar to CAT/GRE examinations. Also, the candidate applying for the BSc CSIT program must have: Successfully completed 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics and secured a minimum grade C in each subject.

patterns: I want to know about upcoming events

responses: Currently We have our weekly event called 'Friday Talks' thats happening every Friday inside the college premise and any other major events that are happening in the coming days will be updated here

patterns: can i get the academic calender
responses: You can download the academic calender of our college from the downloads page on our website.

So I said 'Do you want a game of Darts?' He said, 'OK then', I said nearest to bull starts'. He said, 'Baa', I said, 'Moo', he said, You're closest'.

But I'll tell you what I love doing more than anything: trying to pack myself in a small suitcase. I can hardly contain myself.

After a car crash one of the drivers was lying injured on the pavement. 'Don't worry', said a policeman who's first on the scene,' a Red Cross nurse is coming.' 'Oh no', moaned the victim, 'Couldn't I have a blonde, cheerful one instead?'
A policeman walked over to a parked car and asked the driver if the car was licensed. 'Of course it is', said the driver. 'Great, I'll have a beer then', said the policeman.

A policeman stopped a motorist in the centre of town one evening. 'Would you mind blowing into this bag, sir?' asked the policeman. 'Why?' asked the driver. 'Because my chips are too hot', replied the policeman.

Whizzing round a sharp bend on a country road a motorist ran over a large dog. A distraught farmer's wife ran over to the dead animal. 'I'm so very sorry', said the driver, 'I'll replace him, of course.' 'Well, I don't know', said the farmer's wife, 'Are you any good at catching rats?'
